name: goblin heck
description:
I don't know what this is !! It certainly isn't a game!

This is the first thing EVER that I put out that uses my own silly little game engine.

Move around with WASD.

Get resources, kill monsters, once you are full of resources go back to your base (the ugly blue corner on the top-right), when you go back out, everything is different!

source code: https://github.com/guilhermepo2/gbgj-1

game "engine" source code: https://github.com/guilhermepo2/gueepo2D
